story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Sidebar or top bar allows filtering by Category (e.g., Dresses, Tops). 2. Users can sort products by "Price: Low to High", "Price: High to Low", and "Newest". 3. Filter and Sort state is synchronized with the URL (e.g., `?category=dresses&sort=price_asc`). 4. Changing filters updates the product grid without a full page reload (Client-side navigation or Server Action). 5. "Clear All" button resets filters. 6. Mobile users have a collapsible filter drawer.
